## FeedWriter.upload() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use `uploadReference` or `uploadPayload` instead to disambiguate how the data should be interpreted.
> 

Upload a new feed update

**Signature:**

```typescript
upload(postageBatchId: string | BatchId, reference: Reference | string | Uint8Array, options?: FeedUploadOptions): Promise<UploadResult>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[UploadResult](./bee-js-docs-project.uploadresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;
